item.title: 2020 April Fool's Puzzle Competition Is Now LIVE
item.description:
We are happy to present the 2020 #ircpuzzles April Fool's Puzzle Competition on freenode! It has begun!

The first clue is: V2VEb250TGV0Q09WSUQxOVJ1aW5BRlA=

The theme this year is, Ancient Cultures & Mythology

This year, the first channel is, #ircpuzzles-2020-afpc-level01

Except for Level 01, all spaces are to be replaced with "_" (no …
item.dc:creator: yano

item.title: 2020 April Fool's Puzzle Competition
item.description:
The 2020 #ircpuzzles' April Fool's Puzzle Competition will begin on 2020-04-01 00:01 UTC!

We will announce the first clue in #ircpuzzles on chat.freenode, on our website, and on our Twitter handle @ircpuzzles.
item.dc:creator: yano

item.title: 2019 April Fool's Puzzle Competition Is Now LIVE
item.description:
We are happy to present the 2019 IRCPuzzles April Fool's Puzzle Competition on freenode! It has begun!

The first clue is: WW91dmVGb3VuZFRoZUtleQo=

The first channel is #ircpuzzles-afpc2019-level01 and all subsequent channels are in the same format with increasing level numbers.

Please join us in #ircpuzzles on freenode.
item.dc:creator: yano
